comments.body:
I saw these changes (and the ones in the header) are now in upstream cppyy, nice!

I believe this is the only thing you needed to contribute with upstream?

> I saw these changes (and the ones in the header) are now in upstream cppyy, nice!
> 
> I believe this is the only thing you needed to contribute with upstream?

Thanks! And yes, it's the only requirement I had
